com.betfair.cougar.logging

Class Slf4jCougarLoggingImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betfair.cougar.logging.AbstractCougarLoggerImpl
      • com.betfair.cougar.logging.Slf4jCougarLoggingImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CougarLogger

    public class Slf4jCougarLoggingImpl
extends AbstractCougarLoggerImpl
    SLF4J CougarLogging Implementation. Will map calls to the SLF4j log levels and publish log messages through its API
